posts.post_content: Looking to buy T205 HOFers graded between a 3 and a 5 (or raw in similar condition).  Already have Mathewson, Wheat, Bresnahan (closed), Jennings and Collins (closed).  Willing to pay a fair price for others and willing to consider lower grade/condition for Cobb or Johnson.  Similarly interested in T227 in any condition as long as they are not awful.   Please email me at [url]joshmargolin@gmail.com[/url] with scans and prices.  Thanks.
